abstract: Google has filed a U.S. patent application to put mobile data centers out at sea, either on ships or fixed platforms. The company said the centers could be used to provide Internet services in areas or situations where land-based connections aren’t feasible.

headline.main: Google’s Search Goes Out to Sea
